Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of red-brown pottery ribbed jar, the fabric is grey-orange in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a grey-red slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394157) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394157)
